title: Want to buy: Crandall, Krause, Batch, Dessau, Wright, and SLers
author: 53toppscollector

posts.post_title: Want to buy: Crandall, Krause, Batch, Dessau, Wright, and SLers
posts.post_content:
As my signature states, I am looking for portraits in all backs, but I am focused on picking up the following portraits. Generally looking for lower quality raw cards, in tact with decent eye appeal. I'd also be fine with PSA/SGC A's, 1 or 2s if the price is right. These are the cards I am looking for in particular right now

Crandall WITH Cap

SC 350/460 - 42 OP
AB 460
Cycle 460
EPDG
Old Mill
Polar Bear

Krause Portrait

SC 350/25
EPDG

Wright

SC 350/25
AB 350
Cycle 350
EPDG
Sovereign 350

Batch

SC 350/30
AB 350
Cycle 350
EPDG
Sov 350

Dessau

SC 350/30
AB 350
Cycle 350

Southern Leaguers

King - Old Mill
Paige - Piedmont 350
Lipe - Old Mill
Coles - Piedmont 350
Foster - Piedmont 350
Otey - Old Mill
Westlake - Old Mill

I'm also looking for any other portrait/back combos I don't currently have but it will all depend on price. I am focused on Piedmont/Sweet Cap, American Beauty, Cycle, Polar Bear, Old Mill, EPDG, Tolstoi and Sovereign off backs only. 

If you have any of the above, or have extra portraits not mentioned here, shoot me a PM and let me know what you have. Thanks
very close to completing my non-super rare Krause back run, just need the EPDG and SC 350/25. Any help would be awesome.

bump. 

If you have a Krause EPDG or the SC 350/25, I am probably willing to overpay for them :)
want list has been updated. thanks!
